summary: Vaendral is a ranger-class follower and marriage candidate.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://24.media.tumblr.com/dd6bdab72abe614bf7abe4f7e1b87cfe/tumblr_mhvs1u3TZh1r2xmg4o1_1280.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=3]This mod requires the standalone file \"ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_0\" (NOT the main ApachiiSkyHair file; it\'s a separate file) which can be downloaded [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]here[/url].[/size]
I also recommend the mod \"Beards\" which can be downloaded [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28363/]here[/url].

Vaendral is a ranger who hangs out in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood, meaning he\'s available to even low-level characters. With an Amulet of Mara in hand, Vaendral becomes a marriage candidate too. Vaendral levels with you from 2-50, and his specialties are Archery, Light Armor, One-Handed and Block. Please let me know if you have any difficulty with this file.

Some people have reported that Vaendral does not show up in Riverwood when they install this mod. If this happens, try installing the \"optional\" file. This places Vaendral in Whiterun\'s Bannered Mare Inn instead; this may fix the issue for you.

[size=3][b]I am terrible at taking screenshots; any screens you can submit are appreciated![/b][/size] 

Vaendral is a slightly tweaked version of the Imperial preset found in my other mod, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15641]Better Male Presets[/url]. Check that out if you want Vaendral\'s face on your character. And check out my other mods [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33124]Auleric - Nord Male Mage Follower[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31239/]Auveren - Wood Elf Male Follower[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15589]Stenvar Revamped[/url], and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8007]Sven Revamped[/url] if you like my work. (And a comment/endorsement wouldn\'t hurt either <3).

A big thank you goes out to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2113195]asianboy345[/url] for his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846]TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim[/url] mod, which I used for my screenshots.

Changelog:
v1.0: Original file upload.
v1.01: Vaendral\'s max level changed from 45 to 50. At 50 his preferred stats max out.
v1.02: A number of Stealth perks have been added, so Vaendral will not give thief-type characters away as easily and will no longer set off floor-based traps. Credit goes to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1801645]shadowtigers[/url] for the idea.

[center][img]http://i5.minus.com/jm5WWZ55b8HkC.jpg[/img]
Image courtesy [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1801645]shadowtigers[/url] <3

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31239][img]http://25.media.tumblr.com/28381cb9e69644e9e610eb00815a9b98/tumblr_mjkof4wvKY1r2xmg4o5_250.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15589][img]http://24.media.tumblr.com/9fa30aacaa6001f92e4f717fc17e65e4/tumblr_mkx2d9IEfs1r2xmg4o1_250.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8007][img]http://25.media.tumblr.com/7883dcb5bfb1d72a3dac265f3f17eba0/tumblr_mjkof4wvKY1r2xmg4o6_250.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
author: highonsunday
